documentation.author: Lisa K. Holcomb
documentation.purpose: To alert the user if the Height (cm) just documented is 5% (peds) or 10% (NICU) different from the previous Height(cm) entered in the past 24 hours on the same inpatient, observation encounter.
documentation.explanation:
To alert the user if the Height (cm) just documented is 5% (peds) or 10% (NICU) different from the previous Height(cm) entered in the past 24 hours on the same inpatient, observation encounter.
Result = Height (cm)

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_CE_RESULT_EVAL_E
templateDefinitions.definition: the triggering request contains a STATUS result for EVENT_SET_NAME that is EVALUATION VALUE1 and OPT_VALUE2

statements.statement: eks_codeset_cki_refhelp "8","CKI","*ANY_STATUS" go /* select distinct Result_Status = if (t.seq = 1) cv.description else "*ANY_STATUS" endif, _hidden = if (t.seq = 1) cv.code_value else 0.0 endif from code_value cv, (dummyt t with seq=2) plan cv where cv.code_set = 8 and cv.active_ind = 1 and cv.cdf_meaning > " " join t order Result_Status */

eks_event_set_name_refhelp PAR1, "EVENT_SET" go
/* SELECT IF (PAR1="*ANY") EVENT_SET_NAME="*ANY_EVENT_SET_NAME" ELSEIF (PAR1="ALL") EVENT_SET_NAME = V.EVENT_SET_NAME FROM V500_EVENT_SET_CODE V ORDER cnvtupper(V.EVENT_SET_NAME) ELSEIF (PAR1 != "OTHER") EVENT_SET_NAME = V.EVENT_SET_NAME FROM V500_EVENT_SET_CODE V WHERE CNVTUPPER(V.EVENT_SET_NAME) =PATSTRING(CONCAT(cnvtupper(PAR1),"*")) ORDER cnvtupper(V.EVENT_SET_NAME) ELSE EVENT_SET_NAME= V.EVENT_SET_NAME FROM V500_EVENT_SET_CODE V WHERE CNVTUPPER(substring(1,1,V.EVENT_SET_NAME)) NOT BETWEEN "0" AND "Z" ORDER cnvtupper(V.EVENT_SET_NAME) ENDIF */

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_STOP_LOGIC_L
templateDefinitions.definition: the following templates are false, MODE logic evaluation
templateDefinitions.description: Used to control efficiency of Action Group rules

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_CE_RESULT_INCOMING_REQ_L
templateDefinitions.definition: the triggering request contains a STATUS result for EVENT_SET_NAME that is EVALUATION VALUE1 and OPT_VALUE2

statements.statement:
eks_codeset_cki_refhelp "8","CKI","*ANY_STATUS" go
/* select distinct Result_Status = if (t.seq = 1) cv.description else "*ANY_STATUS" endif, _hidden = if (t.seq = 1) cv.code_value else 0.0 endif from code_value cv, (dummyt t with seq=2) plan cv where cv.code_set = 8 and cv.active_ind = 1 and cv.cdf_meaning > " " join t order Result_Status */

eks_event_set_name_refhelp PAR1, "EVENT_SET" go
/* SELECT IF (PAR1="*ANY") EVENT_SET_NAME="*ANY_EVENT_SET_NAME" ELSEIF (PAR1="ALL") EVENT_SET_NAME = V.EVENT_SET_NAME FROM V500_EVENT_SET_CODE V ORDER cnvtupper(V.EVENT_SET_NAME) ELSEIF (PAR1 != "OTHER") EVENT_SET_NAME = V.EVENT_SET_NAME FROM V500_EVENT_SET_CODE V WHERE CNVTUPPER(V.EVENT_SET_NAME) =PATSTRING(CONCAT(cnvtupper(PAR1),"*")) ORDER cnvtupper(V.EVENT_SET_NAME) ELSE EVENT_SET_NAME= V.EVENT_SET_NAME FROM V500_EVENT_SET_CODE V WHERE CNVTUPPER(substring(1,1,V.EVENT_SET_NAME)) NOT BETWEEN "0" AND "Z" ORDER cnvtupper(V.EVENT_SET_NAME) ENDIF */

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_ENCOUNTER_DETAIL_L
templateDefinitions.definition: the patient's ENC_DETAIL QUAL DETAIL_VALUE for the same encounter as OPT_LINK

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_CE_RESULT_TREND_L
templateDefinitions.definition: NUM_TO_QUALIFY out of the NUM_TO_EVAL most recent results for EVENT_SET_NAME are EVALUATION VALUE1 and OPT_VALUE2 for the same encounter as OPT_LINK over the last OPT_TIME_NUM OPT_TIME_UNIT

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_AGE_EVAL_L
templateDefinitions.definition: Person's age is EVALUATION AGE1 UNIT1 and OPT_AGE2 OPT_UNIT2 using person from OPT_LINK

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_NOTIFY
templateDefinitions.definition: send subject SUBJECT with message MESSAGE to LOCATION linked to procedure PROCEDURE with priority PRIORITY under categories CLASS and SUBCLASS

column.value: Clinical Event End Date and Time
Clinical Event End Date and Time

statements.statement: select c.display_key ,c.cdf_meaning ,c.code_value from code_value c where c.code_set=220 and c.active_ind= 1 and c.begin_effective_dt_tm <= cnvtdatetime(curdate,curtime3) and c.end_effective_dt_tm >= cnvtdatetime(curdate,curtime3) and NOT c.cdf_meaning in ("ROOM","BED","FACILITY","BUILDING", "APPTROOT","BBDRAW","BBOWNERROOT","BBINVAREA", "COLLROOT","COLLRTE","COLLRUN","CSLOGIN","CSTRACK", "HIM","HIMROOT","INVGRP","INVLOC","INVLOCATOR","INVVIEW") and NOT c.cdf_meaning in ("MICRO STATIS","MMGRPROOT", "PTTRACK","PTTRACKROOT","PTRECYCLE","RXLOCGROUP","SRVAREA", "STORAGERACK","STORAGEROOT","STORAGESHELF","STORAGETRAY", "STORAGEUNIT","SURGFILL") order c.display_key

value.value: A height of @RESULT:4:1 cm is not within 10% of the most recent height of @RESULT:4:2 cm entered on @EVENTENDDTTM:4:2. Please modify if necessary.
A height of @RESULT:4:1 cm is not within 5% of the most recent height of @RESULT:4:2 cm entered on @EVENTENDDTTM:4:2.
A height of @RESULT:4:1 cm is not within 1.5% of the most recent height of @RESULT:4:2 cm entered on @EVENTENDDTTM:4:2.
